meanings.definition: A decorative structure surrounding a fireplace.
meanings.sent1: The chimneypiece in the living room was beautifully carved.
meanings.sent2: She placed a vase of flowers on the chimneypiece.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the chimneypiece was a perfect spot for a nap.
meanings.sent4: The family gathered around the chimneypiece, sharing stories and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the chimneypiece added elegance to the room.

meanings.sent1: Above the fireplace, the chimneypiece displayed family photos.
meanings.sent2: During winter, stockings were hung on the chimneypiece with care.
meanings.sent3: The chimneypiece seemed to be the favorite spot for the mischievous elf.
meanings.sent4: As the fire crackled below, shadows danced on the chimneypiece.
meanings.sent5: The chimneypiece was adorned with garlands for the holiday season.
